excerpt: At what point did Moshe get the Holy Spirit? They obviously encountered the Divine Word, the MEMRA, but at some point it is said to him I will divert the spirit that is on you onto these 70/72 men. At
content: At what point did Moshe get the Holy Spirit? They obviously encountered the Divine Word, the MEMRA, but at some point it is said to him I will divert the spirit that is on you onto these 70/72 men. At what point did the spirit get on Moshe?
